remarks: The logarithm of the product of a positive real and a positive real number to the power of a real number is the sum of the logarithm of the first real number and the scaled logarithm of the second real number. (Contributed by AV, 29-May-2020.)
statement: relogbmulexp $p |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ ( A e. RR+ /\ C e. RR+ /\ E e. RR ) ) -> ( B logb ( A x. ( C ^c E ) ) ) = ( ( B logb A ) + ( E x. ( B logb C ) ) ) ) $.
